taskdescription:
Synopsis:  Empties a file.  Good if you want to clear a file you were writing to.   USE CAUTION.  THIS EMPTIES A FILE.  TEST THIS IN DEV FIRST.\
\
Input param:  \
filename = File name to empty.  MAKE SURE that the file is writable by the web server user\
\
Output param:  status\
Output values:  emptied, <error, something like Cannot write to...>\
\
Sample Params Config (fill in over on the left): \
{\
"filename":"/var/www/html/nochero/tmp/files/cooloutput.txt",\
}
